fr.emn.easymol.gui
Class VisualisationWindow

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--java.awt.Component
        |
        +--java.awt.Container
              |
              +--java.awt.Window
                    |
                    +--java.awt.Frame
                          |
                          +--javax.swing.JFrame
                                |
                                +--fr.emn.easymol.gui.VisualisationWindow
All Implemented Interfaces:
javax.accessibility.Accessible, GUIConstants, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, javax.swing.RootPaneContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.swing.WindowConstants
public class VisualisationWindow
extends javax.swing.JFrame
implements GUIConstants

The class to hold the 2D and 3D views.

It contains an instance of the edited Molecule along with its RootAtom.
The path of the file and the Molecule name are saved along with a reference to the ToolBarWindow which is the mother of this ConsoleWindow.
A boolean is used to store the state of the Molecule and determine whether save is needed when the window is closed.

See Also:
Serialized Form
